name: En-Hong Chen
content: En-Hong Chen's Homepage En-Hong Chen Ph.D., Professor, IEEE Fellow, ACM Distinguished Member Vice Dean Faculty of Information and Intelligence, University of Science and Technology of China (USTC) Vice Director State Key Laboratory of Cognitive Intelligence Director Anhui Province Key Laboratory of Big Data Analysis and Application Correspondence Telephone: +86-551-63601558 Email: Homepage: http://staff.ustc.edu.cn/~cheneh Office: Room 625, Diansan Building, West Campus of USTC Mail: En-Hong Chen, School of Computer Science and Technology, University of Science and Technology of China (USTC), Hefei, Anhui,230027 [Brief Biography] [Selected Publications] [Academic Activities] [Awards] [Courses] Brief Biography I am a Professor, vice dean of Faculty of Information and Intelligence of University of Science and Technology of China(USTC), CCF Fellow, IEEE Fellow, ACM Distinguished Member, winner of the National Science Fund for Distinguished Young Scholars (in 2013), and member of the Decision Advisory Committee of Shanghai (Since June, 2018). I am also the vice director of the National Engineer Laboratory for Speech and Language Information Processing, the director of Anhui Province Key Laboratory of Big Data Analysis and Application, and the chairman of Anhui Province Big Data Industry Alliance. I received my B.S degree from Anhui University in 1989, Master degree from Hefei University of Technology in 1992 and Ph.D degree in computer science from USTC in 1996. My current research interests are data mining and machine learning, especially social network analysis and recommender systems. I have published more than 200 papers on many journals and conferences, including international journals such as IEEE Trans, ACM Trans, and important data mining conferences, such as KDD, ICDM, NeurIPS. My research is supported by the National Natural Science Foundation of China, National High Technology Research and Development Program 863 of China, etc. I won the Best Application Paper Award on KDD2008, Best Research Paper Award on ICDM2011, Outstanding Paper Award on FCS2016, and Best Student Paper Award on KDD2024.
